item.description:
Howdy! Jody Cunningham and Fried Cactus will be in the house this Saturday nite. This is a fantastic band you don't want to miss! If you are looking to meeting new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time!  

EVERY SATURDAY NIGHT:

Doors open at 7:00-$10 cover
Line dance lessons 7:30 - 8:30 with Ms Michelle Jackson 
Band 9:00 - 12:30
Ask about our private VIP party area !
See you at Midnight......................Rodeo Bar
www.midnightrodeobar.com
603-703-8444

WELCOME TO NEW MEMBERS:  Sarah, Emily Morris, Susan Makula and MARIA!!  YEEHAW!  Looking forward to meeting you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table to the right of the room before the bar
item.name: Live Country Music and Dancing
